name: Incoming Call
description:
**INCOMPLETE GAME!! The executable provided will NOT have any gameplay or movement.

Your girlfriend is studying abroad in another country, but she wants to video chat you to talk.

This is a Google Cardboard game created for the New Jersey Institute of Technology's BTW Jam. It's inspired by q_dork's "Chat with me". Please check out her game and support her work!

Credits:

Jay - Project lead, asset artist

Branden - Programmer and savior

Rocco - Programmer

Adela - Narrative writer, asset artist
